meanings.definition: To have a stronger or more pleasant smell than something else.
meanings.sent1: The fresh flowers outsmell the old ones in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The bakery outsmells the coffee shop on the corner.
meanings.sent3: The delicious pie outsmells the burnt toast in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: The scent of the ocean outsmells the fragrance of the flowers.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the barbecue outsmells all other scents in the air.

meanings.definition: To emit a stronger or more pleasant smell than something else.
meanings.sent1: The bakery always outsmells the entire street with its fresh bread.
meanings.sent2: The roses outsmell the other flowers in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The cookies in the oven outsmell the burnt popcorn from last night.
meanings.sent4: The perfume outsmells the cologne in the room.
meanings.sent5: The bakery outsmells all other shops with its delightful aroma.
